Application.Controller

Class ProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.ProfileController

  • @Controller
public class ProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for viewing and managing a User's profile.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getProfile

        @RequestMapping(value="/profile",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String getProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                        @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="userEntry")
                                                                                                        int userEntry,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="scenarioId",required=false,defaultValue="0")
                                                                                                        int scenarioId,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="from")
                                                                                                        java.lang.String from)
        Returns the profile page of a User.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the User.
        userEntry - Integer, specifies the entry number of a User (auto-increment field). If the transmitted one is different from the current User it means that that User is trying to see another User's profile. Otherwise it is the User's own profile.
        scenarioId - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        from - String, specifies from which page the request is sent. If "feed" it means that a User is trying to see another User's profile. Otherwise it is the User's own profile.
        Redundant, to be removed.
        Returns:
        "profile" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • createProfile

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/createProfile",
                method=POST)
private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> createProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="createNewPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String newPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="createConfirmNewPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String confirmNewPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="createUsernameTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                  @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String cookie,
                                                                                                                                                  @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String lang)
        Implements the creation of a User account.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        newPasswordTextForm - String, Credentials.password for the account.
        confirmNewPasswordTextForm - String, confirmation of the Credentials.password for the account.
        username - String, Credentials.username for the account.
        cookie - cookie of the User.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String Array containing, if any, errors.

      • updateUsername

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/updateUsername",
                method=POST)
private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> updateUsername(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="usernameTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String cookie,
                                                                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String lang)
        Updates the Credentials.username of an account.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        username - String, the new Credentials.username to be used.
        cookie - cookie of the User.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String Array containing, if any, errors.

      • updatePassword

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/updatePassword",
                method=POST)
private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> updatePassword(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="newPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String newPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(name="oldPasswordTextForm",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String oldPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String cookie,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="confirmNewPasswordTextForm")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String confirmNewPasswordTextForm,
                                                                                                                                                    @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String lang)
        Updates the Credentials.password of an account.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        newPasswordTextForm - String, new Credentials.password for the account.
        oldPasswordTextForm - String, old Credentials.password for the account.
        cookie - cookie of the User.
        confirmNewPasswordTextForm - String, confirmation of the new Credentials.password for the account.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String Array containing, if any, errors.

      • updateProfilePicture

        @RequestMapping(value="/updateProfilePicture",
                method=POST)
private java.lang.String updateProfilePicture(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="newProfilePicture")
                                                                                                                          org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile img,
                                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String cookie)
                                                                                                                   throws PictureUploadException
        Updates the Credentials.password of an account.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        img - MultipartFile, new User profile picture.
        cookie - cookie of the User.
        Returns:
        "fragments/profile-fragments :: picture" string, specifying the Thymeleaf fragment to parse and return to the client.
        Throws:
        PictureUploadException - PictureUploadException, exception in uploading the profile picture for the new User account.

      • logout

        @RequestMapping(value="/logout",
                method=POST)
private java.lang.String logout(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                              @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                              java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Performs the logout action by invalidating the cookie for a User.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the User.
        response - see HttpServletResponse.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
